item.title: Steve Cruz: Regular Man Podcast [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Steve Cruz! Steve spent six years in the USAF, law enforcement, and now hosts The Regular Man Podcast.  We discussed the real world applications that we can take from good theology and apply to every day issues in a man's life. From staying physically fit and eating healthy, to self defense training and implementing self control.  It was a great episode! e sure to check out his podcast, and patronize our sponsors! Enjoy!

item.title: Chase Davis of Full Proof Theology [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Chase Davis. Chase is a Pastor, Author, and Host of the Full Proof Theology Podcast.  They discussed the pressing theological issues facing the church today, the importance of knowing and understanding the doctrine of the trinity and discipleship, and had some fun talking about the London & Westminster Confessions.  Chase also stuck around for a "Fresh 10" segment, and some of his answers will definitely surprise you. 1689 Baptists, am I right?
